definition: a good deal of/quite a lot
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
classifier indicating a small amount or small number greater than 1: some, a few, several

sentences.english: She noted down a number of objections in her note-book.
sentences.chinese: 她在本子上记下了好些反对理由。

sentences.english: He spent most of last week globetrotting in Germany and China.
sentences.chinese: 上周他花了好些时间环游在德国和中国。

sentences.english: They are related in many ways and need to be managed in a holistic approach.
sentences.chinese: 她们之间在品牌办理的好些个方面上具备接洽瓜葛性。

sentences.english: But it took years for other physicians to recognize the potential of umbilical cord blood transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 但过了好些年，其他医生才体认到脐带血移植的潜力。

sentences.english: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away, and believed on Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 因有好些犹太人，为拉撒路的缘故，回去信了耶稣。

sentences.english: The coach seems a step up from Magath, and good.
sentences.chinese: 现在的教练看起来比马加特好些，这不错。

sentences.english: Even a hair of the dog didnt make him feel better.
sentences.chinese: 即使是再喝解宿醉的一杯酒，也不会使他觉得好些。

sentences.english: An entrepreneur in southern China was having better luck.
sentences.chinese: 中国南方的企业家吴君亮则运气好些。

sentences.english: Unexploded bombs still lie buried deep in the earth.
sentences.chinese: 好些未爆弹仍深埋在土里。

sentences.english: Will the story be any good?
Would it make the painting better if I changed that part?
sentences.chinese: 如果我改一下这里，整幅画感觉会不会好些？

sentences.english: The meat of the herbivore is, in comparison, far more edible , smellwise.
sentences.chinese: 相对地，食草动物的肉闻起来要好些，更易食用。

sentences.english: In comparison, the scheme seems superior to the one reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 通过比较，该方案似乎比本文所载的要好些。

sentences.english: You think he is better in health then?
sentences.chinese: 那么你以为他的健康情况是好些吗？

sentences.english: I have consulted a number of law books in our school library.
sentences.chinese: 我曾在我校图书馆里查阅过好些法律书籍。

sentences.english: Now my family condition is getting better and all farm work is done by machines.
sentences.chinese: 现在，家境稍微好些，地里农活也是机械化了。

definition: a while/a spell/a short time/a burst
classifier indicating a small amount or small number greater than 1: some, a few, several
contrary to what one might expect/actually/contrariwise/why don't you
to be on good terms/to be close friends/striving for self-improvement
to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
